channel.title: Controlled Pkz | 317 | OldSchool Feel | Switching | Login & PK
channel.description:
Download - http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/97391880/client.jar Forums - http://www.controlledpkz.com Webclient - http://controlledpkz614.net76.net/
*~* Controlled Pkz is a new 317 revision server that has been released as of 8/26/2013 *~*
Here at Controlled Pkz you can boss with others, we have a range of bosses: - Godwars - Kalphite Queen - KBD - Jad - chaos elemental - Dagganoths - Also a team boss - Flambeed
We are a Pk based server with a lot more to it, There are a variety of bosses for you to kill and obtain points + items along with a few skills to help you along your way of earning GP and not to mention, Pking to your hearts content with the Player killing point system, save up and buy the untradeables and max out your bonuses or purchase a handy new special attack weapon to wipe out your opponent and monsters!
If you are to run out of gp or simply want to earn some more, you can thieve from the stalls which can be located in the general store or at the skills area, The stalls give caskets, you can open them and gain 50k. I worked it out at around 10m GP in around 20 minutes roughly.
Of course, do not fear.. You can make money just by Pking a player and selling the items you gain, depending on the goodies you get!
Features
- VPS 24/7 DDos Protected Hosting
- Perfect Switches, See the video or come try it out yourself!
- Rimmington Home, With wilderness close by!
- Player killing system, earn points.. cash out! - Lots to earn and trade with others.
- Rare & valuable items gained only from the PKP store! e.g Strength amulet (t) +2 on fury stats, it's untradeable.
- All of the Chaotic Weaponry, Maul, rapier, staff, crossbow & Longsword!
- Safe PK system - Allows new users to get used to the PKing (Hotkeys, switching, etc) along with a fun PK area.
- Boss killing system, again earn points and cash out!
- Team Boss - Drops pkp items and other raritys, great for money making with friends.
- Donators have two of their own areas, can choose a player title and have the ability to yell to players
- Donators also have a staking box added for them to use & a spec restoring method.
- Shops all around the Lovely home area
- Jad - Defeat Jad and gain a Kiln cape, he also rewards you 5 pestcontrol points
- ::skills - Herblore, Mining, Smithing, Crafting, Woodcutting, Fletching, Firemaking, Thieveing
-Skilling will help to make you money and keep your bank flowing if you were to run out of items!
- ::commands - This will tell you every command that you as a player will need to know!
- xplock/unlock in the quest tab at any time, brilliant for anything other than master
- Friendly Owner, I will help you as best I can when I can when I'm not sleeping or busy! [center][size=14pt]Media[/size][/center] [center]Join Controlled PKz![/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uQs0dRL.png[/img]
[left]A lot of hybridding!! Great switches![/left]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kKVhAbu.png[/img]
[center]PK points [/center] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2qa35zt.png[/img]
[center]Controls, x10 hits etc.[/center]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2afh30w.png[/img]
[left]PK Point Exchange[/left]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vn2vqo.png[/img]
[center]Player Count today[/center]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/28j8w0o.png[/img] Hope To see You soon, -Jay-

item.title: Controlled Pkz | 317 | OldSchool Feel | Switching | Login & PK
item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

Download - http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/97391880/client.jar
Forums - http://www.controlledpkz.com
Webclient - http://controlledpkz614.net76.net/

~ Controlled Pkz is a new 317 revision server that has been released as of 8/26/2013 ~

Here at Controlled Pkz you can boss with others, we have a range of bosses:

  • Godwars
  • Kalphite Queen
  • KBD
  • Jad
  • chaos elemental
  • Dagganoths
  • Also a team boss - Flambeed

We are a Pk based server with a lot more to it, There are a variety of bosses for you to kill and obtain points + items along with a few skills to help you along your way of earning GP and
not to mention, Pking to your hearts content with the Player killing point system, save up and buy the untradeables and max out your bonuses or purchase a handy new special attack weapon
to wipe out your opponent and monsters!

If you are to run out of gp or simply want to earn some more, you can thieve from the stalls which can be located in the general store or at the skills area,
The stalls give caskets, you can open them and gain 50k. I worked it out at around 10m GP in around 20 minutes roughly.

Of course, do not fear… You can make money just by Pking a player and selling the items you gain, depending on the goodies you get!

Features

  • VPS 24/7 DDos Protected Hosting

  • Perfect Switches, See the video or come try it out yourself!

  • Rimmington Home, With wilderness close by!

  • Player killing system, earn points… cash out! - Lots to earn and trade with others.

  • Rare & valuable items gained only from the PKP store! e.g Strength amulet (t) +2 on fury stats, it’s untradeable.

  • All of the Chaotic Weaponry, Maul, rapier, staff, crossbow & Longsword!

  • Safe PK system - Allows new users to get used to the PKing (Hotkeys, switching, etc) along with a fun PK area.

  • Boss killing system, again earn points and cash out!

  • Team Boss - Drops pkp items and other raritys, great for money making with friends.

  • Donators have two of their own areas, can choose a player title and have the ability to yell to players

  • Donators also have a staking box added for them to use & a spec restoring method.

  • Shops all around the Lovely home area

  • Jad - Defeat Jad and gain a Kiln cape, he also rewards you 5 pestcontrol points

  • ::skills - Herblore, Mining, Smithing, Crafting, Woodcutting, Fletching, Firemaking, Thieveing

-Skilling will help to make you money and keep your bank flowing if you were to run out of items!

  • ::commands - This will tell you every command that you as a player will need to know!

  • xplock/unlock in the quest tab at any time, brilliant for anything other than master

  • Friendly Owner, I will help you as best I can when I can when I’m not sleeping or busy!

Hope To see You soon, -Jay-
